column1: The Respondent-Petitioner-Appellant (hereinafter  referred  to  as  the
"Appellant") invokes the appellate jurisdiction of this Court seeking to  set

aside  an  order  of 
the  Provincial  High  Court  of  the  Western  Province
holden in  Colombo  dated  30.04.2014.  With the  pronouncement of  the  said

order 
in  case  No.  HCRA  183/2011, 
the  Provincial  High  Court  has

dismissed 
the  Appellant's  application  to 
revise  the  issuance  of  writ  of
possession by the Magistrate's Court of Mt.  Lavinia in case No.5475 /S/ll.
